entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:56 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 01:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of snow or freezing rain changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 9:05 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:05 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 9:05 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
